name: Team Fortress 2: Summer 2023 Update
summary: The Summer 2023 Update, also labelled as simply Summer, was a major update for Team Fortress 2 that was released on July 12th, 2023. It introduced 14 new maps, 25 new cosmetic items, 10 new War Paints, 6 new taunts, and 20 new Unusual effects in total (12 for cosmetics and 8 for taunts), as well as a new community-created game mode: Versus Saxton Hale.
